node.statement: NO NON-TRIVIAL BLOCK SYSTEM (Lemma 11.5): By Lemma 11.5 (validated via fixed-point arguments), when n + k + m >= 1, the group H admits no non-trivial block system on Omega. The proof used fixed-point arguments: if an element x is fixed by generator g and lies in block B, then x in g(B), which forces g(B) = B (not disjoint), eventually showing any block B must equal all of Omega.
